messages.messageBody:
Welcome Andie! -glomps new member- Glad you joined us! Oh, and just to warn
you, we're all perfectly mad when it comes to anything about the Shinsengumi.
To put it in the words of Shinpachi Nagakura (PMK): "It only gets worse from
here!" (Don't worry! That's actually a GOOD thing!)

-MissBehavin
